general_info.motto: The college's motto is 'Focus on Excellence'.
general_info.vision: To become a world-class professional institute with a focus on excellence, molding committed global professionals.
general_info.mission: To provide advanced technical education and transform students into industry-ready professionals.

campuslocation.location: FISAT is located at Hormis Nagar, Mookkannoor, Angamaly, Kerala.

admissions.procedures: Admissions at FISAT are based on merit and entrance exams like KEAM. Visit the official website for details.

fees.structure: The fee structure varies by program. BTech fees are approximately â‚¹75,000 per semester.

programs.BTech: FISAT offers BTech programs in CSE, ECE, EEE, ME, Civil, etc.
programs.MTech: MTech specializations include AI & Data Science, VLSI, Structural Engineering, etc.
programs.MBA: MBA is offered with specializations in Finance, Marketing, HR, etc.
programs.MCA: MCA program with integrated options is available.
programs.PhD: Doctoral programs are available in various fields.

faculty.HOD: HODs include Dr. S Krishna Kumar (ECE), Dr. Jiji Antony (Civil), Dr. Abi P Mathew (EIE), etc.

facilities.hostel: Separate hostels for boys and girls with study rooms and WiFi.
facilities.library: Library has 50,000+ books and research journals.
facilities.sports: Sports facilities include a gymnasium and a stadium.
facilities.canteen: A hygienic canteen with multiple food options is available.

events.ICEFOSS: ICEFOSS is a Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) event with hackathons and expert talks.
events.tech_fests: Tech fests focus on innovation, workshops, and competitions.
events.cultural_fests: Cultural fests include music, dance, and creative events.

placementoverview.placements: FISAT has an excellent placement record, with top recruiters visiting annually.
placementoverview.recruiters: Companies like IBM, TCS, Infosys, Wipro, and Accenture recruit from FISAT.
